com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.interfaces

Interface ISolverVariable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDimpleEventSource, IOptionHolder, ISolverEventSource, ISolverNode
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDiscreteSolverVariable, IJunctionTreeSolverVariable<Delegate>, IProxyDiscreteSolverVariable<Delegate>, IProxySolverVariable<Delegate>, ISolverVariableGibbs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GibbsDiscrete, GibbsReal, GibbsRealJoint, JunctionTreeDiscreteSolverVariable, JunctionTreeSolverVariable, LPDiscrete, MinSumDiscrete, ParticleBPReal, ProxyDiscreteSolverVariable, ProxySolverVariable, SDiscreteVariable, SDiscreteVariable, SDiscreteVariableBase, SDiscreteVariableDoubleArray, SFiniteFieldVariable, SRealJointVariable, SRealJointVariable, SRealJointVariableBase, SRealVariable, SRealVariable, SRealVariable, SRealVariableBase, SumProductDiscrete, SumProductFiniteFieldVariable, SumProductReal, SumProductRealJoint, SVariable, SVariable, SVariableBase

    public interface ISolverVariable
extends ISolverNode
    Base interface for solver representation of a variable.

      • setGuess

        void setGuess(@Nullable
            java.lang.Object guess)
        Sets guess to specified value.

        Parameters:
        guess - is either null to unset the guess or a valid value for the domain of the variable.
        See Also:
        getGuess(), guessWasSet()

      • getGuess

        java.lang.Object getGuess()
        Current value of guess for this variable.

        Returns value previously assigned by setGuess(Object) or else returns result of getValue().

        Since:
        0.07
